data.eml:eml: New species of Trichomycterus (Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae) lacking pelvic fins from Paranapanema basin, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Datovo, Alessio (2017): New species of Trichomycterus (Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae) lacking pelvic fins from Paranapanema basin, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4319 (3): 550-560, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4319.3.7
